name: All Of ZHEM 僵尸们
description: You as a agent against hundreds of zombies that can run and climb and always be chasing after you till you become one of Zhem. Navigate through 3 different maps to wipe out every single one of Zhem.
minimum_requirements: OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: 3Ghz Dual Core Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or DX11 equivalent card Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any soundcard
